headline: TheZebra.com Welcomes Former Google Product Leader Daniel Herrington as Chief AI Officer
summary: AUSTIN, Texas, February 18, 2026--TheZebra.com, the easiest way to compare and buy insurance, today announced the appointment of Daniel Herrington as Chief AI Officer. Herrington brings more than a decade of experience in AI product development to the leading insurtech company, having served in multiple senior roles at Google, Vroom, Capital One and Priceline.

headline: DailyPay Announces Appointment of Jennifer R. Jackson to its Board of Directors
summary: DailyPay, the leading On-Demand Pay platform and financial wellness solution, today announced the appointment of Jennifer R. Jackson to its Board of Directors, effective February 13, 2026.

raw.headline: DailyPay Announces Appointment of Jennifer R. Jackson to its Board of Directors
raw.summary: DailyPay, the leading On-Demand Pay platform and financial wellness solution, today announced the appointment of Jennifer R. Jackson to its Board of Directors, effective February 13, 2026.

headline: Capital One Weighs Legal Scrutiny Against Brex-Fueled Commercial Growth Potential
summary: Edelson Lechtzin LLP has launched an investigation into Capital One Financial (NYSE:COF) for potential federal securities law violations tied to investor communications after the company’s Q4 2025 results. Capital One has agreed to acquire fintech firm Brex for US$5.15b, targeting expansion in middle market commercial banking. Both developments affect the company’s legal risk and its approach to growth in business banking services. For you as an investor looking at NYSE:COF, these two...

headline: The 'boomcession': Why Americans feel left behind by a growing economy
summary: A combination of the words "boom" and "recession" can help explain why Americans feel so sour about a growing economy.

raw.headline: The 'boomcession': Why Americans feel left behind by a growing economy

headline: Daniel Loeb's Third Point Loads Up On Chipotle, Constellation, Alibaba While Slashing TSM, Amazon in Q4 Shake-Up
summary: Hedge fund billionaire Daniel Loeb reshuffled positions at Third Point LLC in the fourth quarter, adding several new consumer and international plays while trimming exposure to select mega-cap and semiconductor names.

raw.headline: Daniel Loeb's Third Point Loads Up On Chipotle, Constellation, Alibaba While Slashing TSM, Amazon in Q4 Shake-Up
raw.summary: Hedge fund billionaire Daniel Loeb reshuffled positions at Third Point LLC in the fourth quarter, adding several new consumer and international plays while trimming exposure to select mega-cap and semiconductor names.

headline: Is Capital One Financial (COF) Attractively Priced After Recent Share Price Pullback
summary: If you are wondering whether Capital One Financial's share price still reflects its true worth, this article walks through the numbers so you can judge the value for yourself. The stock recently closed at US$206.74, with returns of 2.9% over 1 year, 100.4% over 3 years and 83.9% over 5 years, although the share price has seen a 6.0% decline over 7 days, 13.5% over 30 days and 16.6% year to date. Recent coverage has focused on Capital One Financial's position as a large US card and banking...
